p: Children and adolescents aged 0–17 years (inclusive) who either presented to A&E or were admitted to inpatient care with mental health disorders were included in this cross‐sectional study. Self‐harm was defined using the UK National Institute for Health and Care Excellence clinical guidelines as 'any act of self‐poisoning or self‐injury, irrespective of the underlying intent (NICE), thus incorporating both nonsuicidal self‐injury, suicide attempts nonsuicidal self‐poisoning and self‐harm with unclear or mixed intent'.
